皪字的基本解释

皪
lì
〔的（
d?）皪〕明亮，鲜明，如“明月珠子，皪皪江靡。”

皪
luò
白色：“丝皪岂常皓。”

皪
bō
〔皪犖〕杂色。

皪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lì］
［《廣韻》郎擊切，入錫，來。］
亦作“1”。
见“皪皪”。
[②]［luò］
［《集韻》歷各切，入鐸，來。］
白色。

皪字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【白字部】　皪； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页790第01
【廣韻】郞擊切【集韻】【韻會】狼狄切【正韻】朗狄切，?音瀝。【廣韻】的皪，白狀。【左思·魏都賦】丹藕凌波而的皪。【註】光明也。或作㿨。　又【玉篇】明珠也。【史記·司馬相如·上林賦】明月珠子，的皪江靡。【註】明珠光也。與玓瓅同。　又【集韻】歷各切，音洛。白色。或作?。　又北角切，音剝。皪犖，雜色。

皪字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
皪字的起名意思

指白色，有明亮，鲜明之义，

iridescence

iridescence

d?) 皪] bright and vivid, such as "Ming Moon Pearl, 皪皪 Jiang Mi."
iridescence

White: "Silver is not always good."

Chinese dictionary definition of words

["Guangyun" Lang hits and cuts, enters the tin, come. ]
Also known as "1".
See "皪皪".
[②]［luò］

white.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [Bai Zi Department] 　皪; Kangxi strokes: 20; page number: page 790 01
[Guang Yun] Tan hit cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Lang Di cut [Zheng Yun] Lang Di cut,? Yin Lek. 【Guangyun】The chamois, white shape. [Zuo Si·Wei Du Fu] Dan lotus rooted in waves. [Note] Bright also. Or as 㿨.　[Jade articles] Pearl also. 【Historical Records·Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu】Mingyue pearls, the delicacy of Peijiangmi. [Note] Mingzhuguang also. Same as 玓瓅.　[Jiyun] Literally, Yinluo. white. Or for?.　Cut again at the north corner and peel off the sound. Naked, variegated.
